titleInfo.title: On the potential in non-Gaussian chain polymer models

mods.abstract: In this paper, we investigate the potential for a class of non-Gaussian processes so-called generalized grey Brownian motion. We obtain a closed analytic form for the potential as an integral of the M-Wright functions and the Green function. In particular, we recover the special cases of Brownian motion and fractional Brownian motion. In addition, we give the connection to a fractional partial differential equation and its the fundamental solution.
